title: Liars
description: The Viscount is safe; now it's time to face the music.I thought I would've been on my way home by now, but the Viscount didn't send me home after Rell sacrificed himself so we could both live. Instead, he wants to go back to Emerald Hall and figure out who's trying to kill him.Where does that leave me? Right back to square one. The Favoring didn't wait for me, and Invidia's House is shrinking... because I'm losing.She's furious. All my hopes of her sending me home are gone. Instead, my prize for winning the Favoring is a life not spent in some hole underground.Winning won't send me home. The Viscount won't send me home. I'm running out of options, running out of time, and Rell is still dead.I don't know what to do, but whatever it is, I have to do it quick.
author: Katerina Martinez
